```{css, echo=FALSE}
#main {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: none;
}
aside {
  display: none;
}

.card-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-around;
}
.card {
  width: calc(50% - 15px);
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  transition: transform 0.1s;
}
.card:hover {
  transform: scale(1.01);
}
.card-img {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}
.card-title{
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 5px 0;
  color: #000;
}
.card-title i {
  margin-right: 5px;
}
```

<div class='card-container'>
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
image_titles <- c(
  "RNA-seq", "basic-teal", "efficacy", "exploratory", "longitudinal",
  "early-dev", "patient-profile", "python", "safety"
)

x <- lapply(
  teal.gallery::list_apps(),
  function(app) {
    cat(
      glue::glue(
        "<div class='card'>
          <a href='sources.html#{app}'>
            <img src='{app}.gif' class='card-img'/>
            <div class='card-title'><i class='fas fa-code'></i> {app}</div>
          </a>
        </div>"
      )
    )
  }
)
```
</div>
